Name: Tetris Christmas
About the game: A casual and relaxing game for those who like Christmas themes or Lofi music, the game has an easy yet challenging difficulty, being able to play both by levels and in infinite mode where the object is always to get more points. The game has the basic mechanics of Tetris, to move the pieces horizontally you have to use the left or right arrow keys, rotate the piece with the up arrow and accelerate the movement with the down arrow on the keyboard, with the space key it is possible to position the piece instantly. Stage Mode: The objective is to complete the challenges that appear in each level to go to the next one, until you finish all the levels. Infinite Mode: The goal is to get as many points as possible, there is no time limit or points, the player can spend hours getting more points.
